summary: this is my fisrt preset mod
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][font=Arial][size=5][b]How to instal:Â [size=3] Install this preset manually. Don't use NMM or MO[/size][/b][/size]
[size=3]this is a mod for [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]racemnu[/url] users so follow these steps[/size]
[/font][list=1]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]Extract the file in data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]in your game hit ` to enable console [/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]write showracemenu [/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]pick the presets tab[/size][/font]
[*][font=Arial][size=3]hit F9 and select citra.jslot [/size][/font]
[/list][font=Arial][size=3]that is the end :)
[/size][/font][font=Arial]

REQUIREMENT MODS LIST:
[/font][/b][/size][list=1]
[*][size=5][b][font=Arial][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]the eyes of beauty[/url] [/size][/font][/b][/size]
[*][size=5][b][font=Arial][size=3]SG Hair pack AIO : google it[/size][/font][/b][/size]
[*][size=5][b][font=Arial][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?][size=3]SG Eyebrows[/size][/url][/font][/b][/size]
[/list][size=5][b][font=Arial]
[/font]
[/b][/size][font=Arial]



sorry for my English[/font]
